TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDictionary`2<TKey, TValue> implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<!TKey, !TValue>>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<!TKey, !TValue>>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public Interface IDictionary(Of TKey, TValue) Implements ICollection(Of KeyValuePair(Of TKey, TValue)), IEnumerable(Of KeyValuePair(Of TKey, TValue))

generic <typename TKey, typename TValue> public interface class IDictionary : System::Collections::Generic::ICollection<System::Collections::Generic::KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>>, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::Collections::Generic::KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>>

span.span: The type of keys in the dictionary.
The type of values in the dictionary.

summary.span: 表示键/值对的泛型集合。

span.span: Represents a generic collection of key/value pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口是键/值对的泛型集合的基接口。The interface is the base interface for generic collections of key/value pairs. 每个元素是存储在一个键/值对对象。Each element is a key/value pair stored in a object. 每个对必须具有唯一键。Each pair must have a unique key. 实现可以改变是否允许`key`要`null`。Implementations can vary in whether they allow `key` to be `null`. 该值可以为`null`和不必是唯一的。The value can be `null` and does not have to be unique. 接口允许的所包含的键和值进行枚举，但它并不表示任何特定的排序顺序。The interface allows the contained keys and values to be enumerated, but it does not imply any particular sort order. `foreach` C# 语言的语句 (`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中， `for each` c + + 中) 返回集合中的元素的类型的对象。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in C++) returns an object of the type of the elements in the collection. 由于每个元素的是一个键/值对，元素类型不是键的类型或值的类型。Since each element of the is a key/value pair, the element type is not the type of the key or the type of the value. 相反，元素类型是。Instead, the element type is . 例如:For example: [!code-cpp[Generic.IDictionary#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.IDictionary/cpp/source2.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[Generic.IDictionary#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.IDictionary/CS/source2.cs#11)] [!code-vb[Generic.IDictionary#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.IDictionary/VB/source2.vb#11)] `foreach`语句是枚举数，仅允许从，不写入集合读取周围的包装器。The `foreach` statement is a wrapper around the enumerator, which only allows reading from, not writing to, the collection. > [!NOTE] > 因为可以继承密钥，但不更改其行为，使用比较能保证其绝对唯一性方法。Because keys can be inherited and their behavior changed, their absolute uniqueness cannot be guaranteed by comparisons using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个空的字符串，对于字符串密钥，并访问其传递接口。The following code example creates an empty of strings, with string keys, and accesses it through the interface. 此代码示例使用方法添加一些元素。The code example uses the method to add some elements. 该示例演示方法抛出异常时尝试添加重复的键。The example demonstrates that the method throws when attempting to add a duplicate key. 该示例使用属性 （C# 中的索引器） 来检索值，演示请求的键不存在，并且可以替换与某个键相关联的值的显示时引发。The example uses the property (the indexer in C#) to retrieve values, demonstrating that a is thrown when a requested key is not present, and showing that the value associated with a key can be replaced. 该示例演示如何使用方法作为更高效的方法来检索值，如果程序必须经常尝试在字典，以及如何使用不方法来测试是否在调用之前存在的项方法。The example shows how to use the method as a more efficient way to retrieve values if a program often must try key values that are not in the dictionary, and how to use the method to test whether a key exists prior to calling the method. 最后，该示例演示如何枚举的键和值在字典，以及如何枚举的值单独使用属性。Finally, the example shows how to enumerate the keys and values in the dictionary, and how to enumerate the values alone using the property. [!code-cpp[Generic.IDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.IDictionary/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Generic.IDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.IDictionary/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.IDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.IDictionary/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 实现类必须具有对键进行比较的方法。

span.span: The implementing class must have a means to compare keys.

summary.span: 向 添加一个带有所提供的键和值的元素。

span.span: Adds an element with the provided key and value to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你还可以使用属性不存在的键的值设置字典; 中添加新元素，例如， `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue` C# 中 (`myCollection("myNonexistentKey") = myValue`在 Visual Basic 中)。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the dictionary; for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue` in C# (`myCollection("myNonexistentKey") = myValue` in Visual Basic). 但是，如果在字典中已存在指定的键，则将设置属性将会覆盖旧值。However, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, setting the property overwrites the old value. 与此相反，方法不会修改现有元素。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 实现可以改变如何确定相等性的对象;例如，类使用，而类允许用户指定实现要用于对键进行比较。Implementations can vary in how they determine equality of objects; for example, the class uses , whereas the class allows the user to specify the implementation to use for comparing keys. 实现可以改变是否允许`key`要`null`。Implementations can vary in whether they allow `key` to be `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个空的字符串，其中有整数键，并访问它通过接口。The following code example creates an empty of strings, with integer keys, and accesses it through the interface. 此代码示例使用方法添加一些元素。The code example uses the method to add some elements. 该示例演示方法抛出异常时尝试添加重复的键。The example demonstrates that the method throws an when attempting to add a duplicate key. 此代码是示例的一个更大可以编译和执行的一部分。This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed. 请参阅 。See . [!code-cpp[Generic.IDictionary#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.IDictionary/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Generic.IDictionary#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.IDictionary/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Generic.IDictionary#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.IDictionary/VB/source.vb#2)]

span.span: if the contains an element with the key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现可以改变如何确定相等性的对象;例如，类使用，而类允许用户指定实现要用于对键进行比较。Implementations can vary in how they determine equality of objects; for example, the class uses , whereas the class allows the user to specify the implementation to use for comparing keys. 实现可以改变是否允许`key`要`null`。Implementations can vary in whether they allow `key` to be `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来测试是否在调用之前存在的项方法。The following code example shows how to use the method to test whether a key exists prior to calling the method. 它还演示如何使用方法，可能是一种更高效的方法来检索值，如果程序频繁尝试不在字典中的键值。It also shows how to use the method, which can be a more efficient way to retrieve values if a program frequently tries key values that are not in the dictionary. 最后，它演示如何插入使用项属性 （C# 中的索引器）。Finally, it shows how to insert items using property (the indexer in C#). 此代码是示例的一个更大可以编译和执行的一部分。This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed. 请参阅 。See . The element with the specified key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供能够通过使用以下语法访问集合中的特定元素： `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)`在 Visual Basic 中)。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)` in Visual Basic). 你还可以使用属性不存在的键的值设置字典; 中添加新元素，例如， `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue` C# 中 (`myCollection("myNonexistentKey") = myValue`在 Visual Basic 中)。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the dictionary; for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue` in C# (`myCollection("myNonexistentKey") = myValue` in Visual Basic). 但是，如果在字典中已存在指定的键，则将设置属性将会覆盖旧值。However, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, setting the property overwrites the old value. 与此相反，方法不会修改现有元素。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 实现可以改变如何确定相等性的对象;例如，类使用，而类允许用户指定实现要用于对键进行比较。Implementations can vary in how they determine equality of objects; for example, the class uses , whereas the class allows the user to specify the implementation to use for comparing keys. C# 语言使用关键字进行定义而不是实现索引器属性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 实现可以改变是否允许`key`要`null`。Implementations can vary in whether they allow `key` to be `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性 （C# 中的索引器） 来检索值，演示请求的键不存在，并且可以替换与某个键相关联的值的显示时引发。The following code example uses the property (the indexer in C#) to retrieve values, demonstrating that a is thrown when a requested key is not present, and showing that the value associated with a key can be replaced. 该示例还演示如何使用作为更有效的方式，当程序必须经常尝试在字典中不检索值的方法。The example also shows how to use the method as a more efficient way to retrieve values if a program often must try key values that are not in the dictionary. 此代码是示例的一个更大可以编译和执行的一部分。This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed. 请参阅 。See . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将功能组合方法和属性。This method combines the functionality of the method and the property. 如果未找到键，则 `value` 参数将为类型 `TValue` 获取适当的默认值；例如，为整数类型获取零 (0)，为布尔值类型获取 `false`，为引用类型获取 `null`。If the key is not found, then the `value` parameter gets the appropriate default value for the type `TValue`; for example, zero (0) for integer types, `false` for Boolean types, and `null` for reference types. ## Examples 该示例演示如何使用方法来检索值。The example shows how to use the method to retrieve values. 如果程序频繁尝试不在字典中的键值方法可以是比使用效率更高属性 （索引器在 C# 中），在尝试检索不存在的键时引发异常。If a program frequently tries key values that are not in a dictionary, the method can be more efficient than using the property (the indexer in C#), which throws exceptions when attempting to retrieve nonexistent keys. 此代码是示例的一个更大可以编译和执行的一部分。This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed. 请参阅 。See .
